resources.string: Add people by Mixin ID or phone number
invites you to a voice call
%1$s invites you to a voice call
The card has been set to not allow sharing
allow bot to send messages represent of you
Change auto-download settings for medias. Voice messages are always automatically downloaded.
Choose a folder, backups will be saved to this location
Back up your messages to external storage. You can restore them when you reinstall Mixin. Messages you back up are not protected while in external storage.
Auto back up to external storage
There are no available memory for backup.
Blocked users can\'t send you messages or add you to groups.
Long press and drag the bot to the top
Please add your favorite bot first.
No permission has been granted to this bot
Mixin ID %1$s is not on your contact list. Make sure the recipient you chosen is correct. If you transfer to the wrong person, your assets will be lost!
No one outside of this call can view or listen to it. Not even Mixin.
This call is secured with end-to-end encryption
You are already on another call. Try after it was ended.
You can\'t minimize a voice call as Mixin isn\'t authorized to use floating windows
Can not recognize the QR code
Are you sure you want to stop recording and discard your voice message ?
You cannot play audio if your\'re already on play another audio.
Tap the button to interact with the bot
Can\'t record voice messages during a Mixin call.
This message decryption failed, please upgrade Mixin to the latest version.
%1$s has invited you to a group call
Your mic will be off to start
Peer connection has been closed, please try again
%1$s joined the group via invite link
Do you want import messages to %1$s ?
Message import failed! Do you want to send it as a file?
You can chat with contacts who have Mixin installed on their phone.
This type of message is not supported, please upgrade Mixin to the latest version. %1$s.

Let\'s chat on Mixin Messenger! Simple, safe, and easy to use. It also supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies, download https://mixin.one/messenger and search @%1$s to add me as a friend.
Messages you selected will be deleted for everyone on the latest version of Mixin in this chat.
Waiting for %1$s to get online and establish an encrypted session. %2$s.
Check trace info failed, please try again
Create circle for different groups of chats and quickly switch between them
Create circles for different groups of chats and quickly switch between them
You can add contacts or groups to the current circle
Mixin needs access your contacts to help you connect with other people on Mixin.
Hey, I\'m using Mixin Messenger to chat. Download it here: https://mixin.one/messenger
Create a group chat with up to friends
Once deleted, all this chat messages will be cleared
The database is being upgraded, it may take several minutes, please do not close this App.
Attention: If a harmful SQL statement is executed, the result is irreversible!
Delete your account info and profile photo
Attention: Please try a small amount for the first deposit. Both a Memo and an Address are required to successfully deposit your %1$s to Mixin Messenger.
Please try a small amount for the first deposit.
Memo is required, or you will lose your coins.
Both Memo and Address are required to deposit your %1$s to you account.
Deposit at least %1$s for the first time.
This address supports all base on EOS tokens.
This address supports all ERC-20 tokens, such as ETH, XIN, etc.
This address supports all TRC-10 and TRC-20 tokens.
For your account security, please set up the PIN before logging into the desktop app.
You have your desktop logged in
Please upgrade Mixin Messenger Desktop to the latest version.
Detected a Mixin QR code, tap to recognize
When enabled, new messages sent and received in this chat will disappear after they have been seen, read the document to **learn more**.
Enter your PIN to delete your account
Enter your emergency contact Mixin ID
The address does not exist, please make sure that the address is added successfully
Address refresh failed, please try again
ERROR %1$d: The request data has invalid field
ERROR %1$d: Blockchain not in sync, please try again later.
Network connection timeout, please try again
ERROR %1$d: The group chat is full.
ERROR %1$d: Insufficient transaction fee. Please make sure your wallet has %2$s as fee
ERROR %1$d: Invalid address format. Please enter the correct %2$s %3$s address!
ERROR %1$d: Send verification code too frequent, please try again later.
Memo has too many characters, maximum is 200
Not supported audio format, please open by other app.
ERROR %1$d: The number has reached the limit.
ERROR %1$d: Please update Mixin(%2$s) to continue use the service.
You have tried more than 5 times, please wait at least 24 hours to try again.

plurals.name: error_pin_incorrect_with_times
plurals.item: ERROR %1$d: PIN incorrect. You still have %2$d chance. Please wait for 24 hours to retry later.
ERROR %1$d: PIN incorrect. You still have %2$d chances. Please wait for 24 hours to retry later.

resources.string: ERROR %1$d: Transfer amount is too small
Please forward all attachments after they have been downloaded
Can\'t find an app able to open this link.\n%1$s
Can\'t find an app able to open this media.
ERROR %1$d: This phone number is already associated with another account.
Yes, there is a fourth PIN confirmation, and I promise it\'s the last one to ensure you have remembered your PIN. The PIN is unrecoverable if lost.
Group calling allows up to %1$d participants to call each other
You can\'t send messages to this group because you\'re no longer a participant.
Hold to record, release to send
Anyone with Mixin can follow this link to join this group. Only share it with people you trust.
Your account will be deleted on %1$s, if you continue to log in, the request to delete your account will be cancelled.
We will never display your mobile number publicly.
Tap \"Agree & Continue\" to accept the %1$s and %2$s
We will send a 4-digit code to your phone number %1$s, please enter the code in next screen.
Enter the 4-digit code sent to you at %1$s
Mixin needs access to draw above other apps to play videos in Picture-in-Picture mode.
The live has been set to not allow sharing
System time is unusual, please continue to use again after correction
There were no results for \"%1$s\"\nTry new search
Enable your GPS to access location
Continue to log in and abort account deletion
Messages to this conversation are encrypted end-to-end, tap for more info.
This type of message is not supported, please upgrade Mixin to the latest version.
This multisig link has already been signed by yourself, you can not make a duplicate operation.
This multisig link has already been unlocked by someone, you can not make a duplicate operation.
Requires start in background permission for continue
Create your first digital wallet, all your digital assets in one wallet, easy send and receive cryptocurrency.
Shows what music is currently playing in Mixin Messenger
Don\'t miss messages from your friends.
The number has reached the limit
This payment link has already been paid by someone, you can not make a duplicate payment.
Who can find me by my number
You\'ll be asked for it periodically to help you remember it.
Please confirm your 6 digit PIN again
Please confirm the 6 digit PIN and remember it
If lost, there is no way to recover your wallet.
Do you want to change your phone number?
If you want to share a bot, add it to your contacts first
Use the built-in Camera to scan any QR Code. When a code is detected, tap the notification to view more information.
Restore your messages from external storage.\nIf you don\'t restore new, you won\'t be able to restore later.

Back up your messages and media to external storage. You can restore them when you reinstall Mixin. Your messages and media will also back up to your phone\'s internal storage. Media and messages your back up are not protected by Mixin end-to-end encryption while in external storage.
Not found, please copy the backup file into %1$s
Warning: Many users reported this account as a scam. Please be careful, especially if it asks you for money
Scan the QR code to add me on Mixin
Search Mixin ID or phone number:
This will improve reliability for incoming notifications and Mixin calls
This will improve reliability for incoming notifications and Mixin calls. Please select **Optimised** or **Unrestricted** in Settings > Battery.
This will improve reliability for incoming notifications and Mixin calls. Tap Settings -> Battery and turn **Allow background activity** on.
No biometric or device credential is enrolled
The key NOT resides inside secure hardware (TEE)
The PIN, pattern or password is NOT set or a SIM card is unlocked
Who can add me to groups
Who can send message to me
Local messages and Backups will not be Deleted automatically
If you continue, your profile and account details will be delete on %1$s. read our document to **learn more**.
We will send a 4-digit code to %1$s

Your Mixin wallet still has some assets that can be withdrawn to other wallets or exchanges. Once the account is cancelled, these assets will be abandoned along with the wallet and cannot be recovered.
Confirm login to Mixin Messenger Desktop
Display confirmation dialog when you transfer the same amount to the same person within 6 hours.
Do you want to change your mobile number now?
The emergency contact is designed to help you log in to your account if you are lost and can not retrieve your mobile number.
When your lost your mobile number, please contact your emergency contact by phone or other means to get the Mixin ID and verification code. Read our Emergency Contact to **learn more**.
Your emergency contact is protected by PIN
Enter the 4-digit code sent to Mixin ID: %1$s
Confirm to set Mixin ID %1$s as your emergency contact? Please note that the other party must add you as a contact to set up successfully.
Attention: the Emergency Contact cannot help you to recover PIN
This will remove your contacts from the Mixin servers.
Display notifications when receiving a transfer greater than or equal to %1$s.
Change who can add you to conversation and groups.
Display confirmation dialog when you transfer to stranger
Show confirmation dialog when transfer greater than or equal to %1$s.
Show confirmation dialog when transfer greater than %1$s.
Are you sure you want to send a %2$s from %1$s?
Are you sure you want to send the %1$s?
Requires stickers file size larger than 1KB and less than 1MB, width and height between 128px and 1024px.

Your phone is low on storage, which can seriously affect your Mixin experience and may even result in corrupted or lost chats and other important data. So it\'s recommended to uninstall unused apps to clear up enough space
Your phone is low on storage
This sender is not in your contacts
Mixin syncs your address book to Mixin servers to help you connect with other Mixin users.
It\'s rare to see a third confirmation somewhere else, so please remember the PIN is unrecoverable if lost.
Scan the QR Code to transfer me on Mixin
You must setup PIN for transfer
When enabled, you\'ll need to use fingerprint to open Mixin.
Are you sure you want to unpin all messages?
An update has just been downloaded.
The current version (%1$s) is no longer available!\nPlease click \"Update\" below to update to the latest version from the Google Play.
Assets %1$s have been hidden by you, want to show them immediately on the wallet homepage?
Mixin does not support withdrawal to the
Invalid biometrics state, please reset in wallet setting.
Use your device pattern to continue
Once enabled, biometrics can be used to make quick transfers
Please enter the 6 digit PIN to verify.
The PIN is not the same twice, please try again.
Please set a new 6 digit PIN.
Set a 6 digit PIN to create your first digital wallet, read the document to **learn more**.
The PIN is too simple and insecure.
Please enter PIN to Modify Pay with PIN interval
Please enter PIN to open Biometrics
For the security of your assets, you need to verify your PIN for the specified interval.
Please remember the PIN is unrecoverable if lost. The PIN is based on the Throttled Identity Protocol, which is the decentralized key derivation protocol, read the document to **learn more**.
The withdrawal fee has been changed and the refresh fails, please try again.
historical value at the time of transaction
Are you sure you want to transfer %3$s worth %2$s to %1$s?
Asset key is NOT a deposit address!
You have already transferred %3$s to %2$s %1$s ago. Do you want to transfer it again?
The withdrawal fee has been changed from %1$s to %2$s, would you like to proceed with the request?
You have already withdrawn %3$s to %2$s %1$s ago, Do you want to withdraw it again?
%1$s took too long to respond. Please check your network and try to switch 4G, Wi-Fi or VPN to reload the page.
You can\'t floating as Mixin isn\'t authorized to use floating windows
Floating limit reached. Close some before adding new ones.
The link is not in the corresponding resource patterns.
Destination Tag or ID Number or notes. If not, you can set it No Memo.
If you are required to fill in Destination Tag or ID Number or notes, you can Add Memo.
If you are required to fill in Destination Tag or ID Number or notes, you can Add Tag.
Destination Tag or ID Number or notes. If not, you can set it No Tag.
For the first withdrawal to a new address, please try small amounts! If you withdraw the assets to the wrong address, that would not be recovered!
